page.title: 17Building Destruction
page.content: Figuring prominently in this square is the 15 acre college site of what once was the glamogan college of education and which in 1974 became part of the Polytechnic of Wales. As it is no longer used as an Educational establishment - Mid Glamorgan county council - who own the site have decided to demolish the buildings and sell the site to developers. This decision has been met with outrage by conservationists,as is the proposed destruction of the original college building erected in 1914. Barry councillors maintain that the campus could be used for conference facilities and this legalised or muiciapal vandalism should therefore be prevented. Many people feel that if the college is demolished it would be a sad day for everyone who had taught or studied there.
